block.p: Multinationals Sign Pact Pressed by Secretary General Kofi Annan, about 50 multinational companies signed a ''global compact'' at the United Nations that commits them to support human rights, eliminate child labor and refrain from polluting the environment.

Kentucky Battles a Plague The hills of eastern Kentucky are home to thousands of people who are functionally illiterate, but the state is vigorously campaigning to turn that around so those potential workers can find jobs.
Nonprofit Goes Broadway The nonprofit Roundabout Theater, housed not so long ago in a supermarket basement, opens in an elegant showplace on 42nd Street tonight. Some consider the move a sellout.
